price: (23) And We will approach [i.e., regard][1016] what they have done of deeds and make them as dust dispersed.
arabic: وَقَدِمۡنَآ إِلَىٰ مَا عَمِلُواْ مِنۡ عَمَلٖ فَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ هَبَآءٗ مَّنثُورًا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: waqadim'nā ilā mā ʿamilū min ʿamalin fajaʿalnāhu habāan manthūran
